comments.body: nit: it's not clear to me from reading the doc what happens when both `helper` and `error` are non-null. Is there a reason we are allowing 2 widgets under `prefix` and `child`?

Not a reason for it tbh. I just thought it might be useful to include both. (Say if you want to have the helper on at all times but then the error appears when validated.) Let me know if you think I should remove it. I showed it to @xster a couple of days ago
